<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages -odac -iadc -d ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o locsig_stereo.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
; Initialize the global variables. sr = 44100 kr = 4410 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 2
ga1 init 0 ga2 init 0 ; Instrument #1 instr 1 ; Use the "beats.wav" audio file. aout diskin2 "beats.wav", 1, 0, 1 kdegree line 0, p3, 180 kdistance line 1, p3 , 30 a1, a2 locsig aout, kdegree, kdistance, .1 ar1, ar2 locsend ga1 = ga1+ar1 ga2 = ga2+ar2
outs a1, a2 endin
instr 99 ; reverb instrument a1 reverb2 ga1, 2.5, .5 a2 reverb2 ga2, 2.5, .5 outs a1, a2 ga1=0 ga2=0 endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore>
; Table #1, a sine wave. f 1 0 16384 10 1
; Play Instrument #1 for five seconds. i 1 0 2 i99 0 5 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
